model.interfaces.Player

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void GameEngine.addPlayer(Player player) 
      void GameEngineCallback.intermediateResult(Player player, DicePair dicePair, GameEngine gameEngine)
      called as the dice are rolling for a Player, use this to update your display or log to console
      boolean GameEngine.placeBet(Player player, int bet)
      the implementation should forward the call to the player class so the bet is set per player
      boolean GameEngine.removePlayer(Player player) 
      void GameEngineCallback.result(Player player, DicePair result, GameEngine gameEngine)
      called when dice have stopped rolling with the final resting dice values
      void GameEngine.rollPlayer(Player player, int initialDelay, int finalDelay, int delayIncrement)
      roll the dice progressing from the initialDelay to the finalDelay in increments of delayIncrement, delays are in milliseconds (ms) 1.
